979650.name: Despotism 3k - Soundtrack
979650.description:
Three versions of our three soundtracks, which are used in the game, and one more original piece! Buy this DLC to support our musician =)
Music by Vova Sedykh of "Горечь" and "Он Юн" bands. Search for their songs on the web!

Track Listing
  • Kill All Humans Soft
  • Kill All Humans Clean
  • Kill All Humans Hard
  • Cybermaster Easy
  • Cybermaster Normal
  • Cybermaster Hard
  • Ironworld Easy
  • Ironworld Normal
  • Ironworld Hard
  • Kill All Humans Beta (Bonus!)

The formats available are .aiff and .mp3.
979650.supported_languages:
英语*, 俄语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
